response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high worth to you, valued at $15,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it from me at a special price of $13,000. This offer is designed to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing my earnings. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange the details promptly.", "product_price": 13000}
